sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import products from "../assets/data/products"; import Helmet from "../components/Helmet/Helmet"; import CommonSection from "../components/UI/CommonSection"; import "../styles/product-details.css"; const ProductDestails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const product = products.find(item=> item.id ===id) const { imgUrl, productName, price, avgRating, review, description, shortDesc } = product return (

{productName}

({avgRating}ratings)

${price}

{shortDesc}
) }; export default ProductDestails;
